decisions.description: Only trigger these tasks to get created if the Loan Owner is 1) Active and 2) Not on an Identity User profile.
decisions.name: Check_if_Loan_Owner_is_Active_and_Non_Identity_User
decisions.label: Check if Loan Owner is Active and Non Identity User

rules.name: Active_Loan_Owner_Non_Identity_User
rules.label: Active Loan Owner, Non Identity User

decisions.description: Checks if the loan anniversary is > 5 years
decisions.name: Is_5_Years_Old
decisions.label: Is > 5 Years Old?

Flow.description: 12/23/24: Exclude anniversaries after 5 years. Only trigger notifications on Loan Owners who are active and not Identity users.

formulas.description: Calculates the number of years between the closed won date on the loan and today. Used to determine if anniversary is <= 5 years
formulas.name: numberOfYearsFormula

Flow.label: Post Close LO Scheduled FLow

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7) AND (8 OR 9)
